ai-iti100:0.3_0: The Chapter on the Holy Offering of the Teaching
ai-iti100:0.4_0: 100. The Holy Offering of the Teaching
ai-iti100:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti100:2.1_0: “I, Mendicants, am a brahmin, committed to charity, always open-handed, bearing my final body, a healer, a surgeon.
ai-iti100:2.2_0: You are my rightful children, born of my mouth, born of the teaching, created by the teaching, heirs in the teaching, not in material things.
ai-iti100:3.3_0: The better of these two gifts is the gift of the teaching.
ai-iti100:4.1_0: There are these two kinds of sharing.
ai-iti100:4.2_0: material things and sharing the teaching.
ai-iti100:4.3_0: The better of these two kinds of sharing is sharing the teaching.
ai-iti100:5.1_0: There are these two kinds of support.
ai-iti100:5.2_0: And they support in material things and support them.
ai-iti100:5.3_0: The better of these two kinds of support is support in the teaching.
ai-iti100:6.2_0: Generosity with material things and generosity with the teaching.
ai-iti100:6.3_0: The better of these two kinds of enjoyment is the enjoyment of the teaching.”
ai-iti100:7.1_0: “The Realized One, compassionate for all living creatures,
ai-iti100:7.3_0: Such a one has arisen in him—
ai-iti100:8.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
ai-iti100:8.2_0: First the first part of the body.
